extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected WhatsApp Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the installed version of WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business on Android or iOS is affected by the vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Security Updates for WhatsApp
extracted_playbook.description: Update WhatsApp or WhatsApp Business to the latest version to address the reported vulnerabilities.

affected_products: WhatsApp for Android prior to v2.22.16.12
WhatsApp Business for Android prior to v2.22.16.12
WhatsApp for iOS prior to v2.22.16.12
WhatsApp Business for iOS prior to v2.22.16.12
